description.en-US:
AI-powered price tracker extension for Firefox that automatically monitors product prices across all e-commerce websites using OpenAI's advanced API.

Key Features:
• Intelligent price extraction from any website
• Automated scheduled price checks with customizable intervals
• Instant browser notifications for price drops
• Dual viewing modes (popup and sidebar)

Perfect for online shopping, deal hunting, price comparison, and saving money on purchases from any online store.

developer_comments.en-US: This extension requires users to provide their own OpenAI API key. It stores price tracking data locally and in Firefox sync storage. No data is shared with third parties except OpenAI for price analysis.
